alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:17PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LAMOURE, NORTHWESTERN DICKEY AND NORTHEASTERN MCINTOSH COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CDT... At 117 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 8 miles north of La Moure to 6 miles east of Merricourt City to 9 miles southwest of Kulm. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts to 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Merricourt City around 120 PM CDT. Lamoure around 135 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include La Moure and La Moure City. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
